content: I actually work for a Lexus dealership and know exactly how to get this done. Would take about 30 minutes and I can do it this weekend for $50 plus parts fees
Just replaced one last weekend for someone else. I know exactly what we'll need. We can work out a fair price to get this done for you.
I know exactly your issue, I deal with this all the time at my work. Can get it done this weekend if you'd like.
